title: Summer Special Discount
description: Get 20% off on all tests this summer. Use code SUMMER20 at checkout.

title: Refer a Friend
description: Refer a friend and get 10% off on your next test booking.

title: First-Time User Discount
description: New users get $10 off on their first test booking. Limited time offer!

title: Health Checkup Package
description: Book a health checkup package and save up to 30% on comprehensive tests.

title: Senior Citizen Discount
description: Senior citizens aged 60 and above receive a 15% discount on all tests.

title: Weekend Flash Sale
description: Exclusive discounts every weekend! Stay tuned for exciting offers.
